unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Degrees of Freedom
question_text: What is an appropriate number of degrees of freedom to use when conducting a two-sample $t$-test for the difference between two means?

choices.text: $n – 1$, where $n$ is the number of different populations.
$n – 1$, where $n$ is the larger of the two sample sizes.
$n – 1$, where $n$ is the smaller of the two sample sizes.
$n – 1$, where $n$ is the total number of observations in both samples combined.
$n – 2$, where $n$ is the total number of observations in both samples combined.
